lead_paragraph: Hannes Reichelt of Austria won the men’s World Cup giant slalom in Whistler, British Columbia, ahead of Didier Cuche of Switzerland and Benjamin Raich of Austria. Bode Miller, who finished seventh, retained his lead in the overall World Cup standings.
